# Question 1
## Part a.)
```{r}
name = c("John","Peter","Jolie","Jason","Leslie","Donna")
gender = c("Male","Male","Female","Male","Female","Female")
salary = c(21000,23000,25000,30000,20000,35000)
startDate = c("2010-11-01","2008-12-15","2007-12-01","2001-10-10","2009-01-10","2001-05-01")
chef = data.frame(name, gender, salary,startDate)
```

## Part b.)
```{r}
chef2 = chef%>% select(gender,salary,startDate)
chef2
```

## Part c.)
```{r}
femaleChef = chef%>%filter(gender == "Female")
femaleChef
```

## Part d-e.)
```{r}
avgSalaryBarChart = chef%>%
  group_by(gender)%>%
  summarise(avgSalary = mean(salary), stdDevSalary = sd(salary))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=gender,y=avgSalary))+geom_bar(stat="identity")
avgSalaryBarChart
```
